title: Group dialog should be shown even when dataset is not set
description: When a table report item is added without setting the dataset, the group dialog is not shown.
OB: The group dialog is not shown when attempting to create a new table group without setting the dataset.
EB: The group dialog should be shown even when the dataset is not set, allowing the user to create a new table group.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Add a table report item without setting the dataset.
2. Try creating a new table group.
